mapper.insert: insert into pref ( title, del_yn, id ) values(#{title}, 'N', #{id});
mapper.select: select no,del_yn from pref where id = #{id} and title=#{title}
select no,del_yn from pref where id = #{id} and title=#{title} and del_yn = "N"
mapper.update: update pref set del_yn = 'Y' where no = #{no}
update pref set del_yn = 'N' where no = #{no}
